verses.name: Numbers 4:42
verses.text: And those that were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari, throughout their families, by the house of their fathers,

verses.name: Numbers 4:43
verses.text: From thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that entereth into the service, for the work in the tabernacle of the congregation,

verses.name: Numbers 4:44
verses.text: Even those that were numbered of them after their families, were three thousand and two hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 4:45
verses.text: These be those that were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari, whom Moses and Aaron numbered according to the word of the Lord by the hand of Moses.
